TURBO.name: turbo
TURBO.description: send a message to gpt-3.5-turbo instead of gpt-4

NEW_CONVERSATION.name: new_conversation
NEW_CONVERSATION.description: start a new conversation, forgetting the previous one

SWITCH_CONVERSATION.name: switch_conversation
SWITCH_CONVERSATION.description: send the date and time you sent the /new_conversation command for a previous conversation in YYYY-mm-DD-HH-MM format to switch to a different conversation

NO_RESPONSE.name: no_response
NO_RESPONSE.description: send a message without requesting a response (e.g. to break up one long message into parts)

SEARCH.name: search
SEARCH.description: search all your previous conversations for the most semantically similar one to the message you send. the first argument after the command should be the number of results you would like to request.

VERIFY.name: verify
VERIFY.description: verify a user's identity by sending their user id

USAGE_STATS.name: usage_stats
USAGE_STATS.description: get usage statistics for all users
